activities:
Information would be received on a corporate entity level only.

Only personal data processed is employee data.
recoursemech: JLT Re (North America) Inc. has implemented an internal dispute resolution process for Safe Harbor complaints. For disputes that are not resolved through such process, JLT Re (North America) Inc. agrees to submit to the jurisdiction of the EU Data Protection Authorities for unresolved disputes involving the HRPI of any individual from the EU, as well as to that of the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland for unresolved disputes involving the HRPI of any individual from Switzerland.
